RESPONDENT'S ANNEXURES: NIL / TRUE COPY/ sts P.S.TO JUDGE 2018/KER/979 B. KEMAL PASHA, J. ee ene "Dated this the 9 day of January, 2018 ORDER Annexure A12 proceedings have been initiated before the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court, Chottanikara, by the Chottanikara Police under Section 107 Cr.P.C. 2. Much discussion is not required to conclude that there are no materials to initiate proceedings under Section 107 Cr.P.C. as against the petitioner. Matters being so, Annexure A712 is liable to be quashed. In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed and Annexure- A12 proceedings, as against the petitioner, are hereby quashed. Sd/- B. KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE. ul/- [True copy] P.S. to Judge.
